name: reality-capture-main
description: This project contains iTwin API SDK for ContextCapture and RealityDataAnalysis as well as reality data API utils in typescript.

scripts.build: pnpm -r --filter "reality-capture" run build && pnpm -r --filter "reality-capture-node" run build && pnpm -r --filter=!reality-capture --filter=!reality-capture-node --filter=!reality-capture-web-app run build
